name: Corrugated Zinc Sheet - 12 ft (28 gauge)
description: Standard 12-foot galvanized sheet for replacing damaged classroom roofs.

name: Zinc Roof Sheet
description: Corrugated galvanized zinc sheet for replacing damaged classroom roofs.

name: Zinc Roof Sheet - Maintenance
description: Corrugated galvanized zinc sheet for maintenance and repair of classroom roofs.

name: Industrial Roof Sheeting (Square)
description: Industrial-grade roof sheeting measured in squares (100 sq ft) for full building coverage.

name: Zinc Ridge Cap - 12 ft
description: Pre-bent ridge flashing for sealing corrugated zinc roof peaks.

name: Galvanized Roof Flashing - 12 ft
description: Sidewall flashing for tying zinc sheets into parapets and gutters.

name: Strip Flat - 12 ft
description: Flat metal strip for roofing and trim work, 12 feet length.

name: Strip Flat - 14 ft
description: Flat metal strip for roofing and trim work, 14 feet length.

name: Zinc Aluminum Sheet - 8 ft
description: Zinc aluminum roofing sheet, 8 feet length.

name: Zinc Aluminum Sheet - 12 ft
description: Zinc aluminum roofing sheet, 12 feet length.

name: Cellotex Hardboard
description: Hardboard sheet for roofing and construction applications.

name: Zinc Sheet - 20 ft Galvanized
description: Corrugated galvanized zinc sheet, 20 feet length, for roofing applications.

name: Zinc Sheet - 16 ft Galvanized
description: Corrugated galvanized zinc sheet, 16 feet length, for roofing applications.

name: 26-Gauge Zinc Roofing Sheet
description: Heavy-duty 26-gauge corrugated zinc sheet for permanent home roof replacement.

name: Galvanized Roof Ridge Cap
description: Galvanized ridge capping for sealing roof peaks after zinc sheet installation.

name: Roofing Tar Paper Roll
description: Waterproof underlayment roll that protects timber decking before zinc sheets are fastened.

name: Roof Sealant & Flashing Kit
description: Bundle of sealant tubes and flashing tape for closing joints, penetrations, and ridge seams.

name: Cow Shed Zinc Roofing Pack
description: Set of zinc roofing sheets sized for agricultural sheds to restore cow shelter.

name: Gutter & Downspout Kit
description: Gutter lengths, hangers, and downspouts for capturing shed roof runoff into troughs.
